title: The Ex Project - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Handsome Male Lead   Marriage of Convenience   Protagonist Strong from the Start
author: 花间一壶酒
description:
During the daytime, Ding Qiuyu was the magazine reporter whose only task was to capture all intimate moments between Huo Qiming and his countless mistresses. 

But at night, she could only sit inside the empty villa, waiting desperately for the back of Huo Qiming who never loved her, as his unknown wife. 

Ding Qiuyu thought that heartbroken divorce would be the end of their story, but when Huo Qiming appeared again in front of her and gradually fell for her this time, what would be her choice? Facing him who had grown up from a childish boy to a responsible man, would the flame of love be ignited again?>
